description: Detects Office Applications executing a Windows child process including directory traversal patterns
name: Office Directory Traversal CommandLine
query: (process.parent.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe OR *\\msaccess.exe OR *\\mspub.exe OR *\\eqnedt32.exe OR *\\visio.exe) AND process.executable:(*\\Windows\\System32\\* OR *\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*) AND process.command_line:("..\/..\/..\/.." OR "..\\..\\..\\.." OR "..\/\/..\/\/..\/\/.."))
author: @SBousseaden (idea)
Christian Burkard (rule)
